Name: HelloWorld:ESCAPE
About the game: Explain the game Kill your enemies and find a way out! 'HelloWorld:ESCAPE' is a game created by high school students in Korea. You're trapped. What you see nearby in this surreal space is only white walls and enemies. You have to escape from this space full of enemies. 'HelloWorld:ESCAPE' consists of two chapters, five stages per chapter, and offers a shooting range where players can play freely. Game settings provide a variety of setting functions to make play easier. Language setting, basic mouse sensitivity and aiming mouse sensitivity, as well as aiming mouse sensitivity, scope mouse sensitivity, and various sound setting functions are included. You can also check the names of the music used in the game on the Copyright tab, and you can also check the names of the people who created the game on the Director tab. Let's get started right away!
